summary.span: 表示有关如何在 Windows 7 任务栏缩略图中显示按钮的信息。

span.span: Represents information about how to display a button in the Windows 7 taskbar thumbnail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供增强功能，使您可以使用任务栏按钮向用户传达状态，并在窗口最小化或隐藏时公开常见任务。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 您可以向任务栏缩略图添加按钮，以提供对常见任务的访问，而无需切换到应用程序窗口。You can add buttons to the taskbar thumbnail to provide access to common tasks without switching to the application window. 例如，Windows Media Player 提供播放、暂停、前进和后退按钮，你可以在应用程序被最小化时使用这些按钮来控制任务栏缩略图中的媒体播放。For example, Windows Media Player provides Play, Pause, Forward, and Back buttons that you can use to control media playback from the taskbar thumbnail when the application is minimized. 类包含一些属性，这些属性描述 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell 如何显示任务栏缩略图中的按钮。The class contains properties that describe how the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell displays the buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 它在本机 Windows API 周围提供托管包装。It provides a managed wrapper around the native Windows API. 对象包含在集合中 。 objects are contained in the collection. 在早于的 Windows 版本中，增强任务栏功能不可用 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 。The enhanced taskbar functionality is not available in versions of Windows earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在中 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] ，某些功能可能不可用，具体取决于用户的设置。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings. 例如，启用时，按钮仅显示在任务栏缩略图中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] 。For example, buttons are only shown in the taskbar thumbnail when [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] is enabled. 您的应用程序应提供与用户交互的其他方法，这些方法与不依赖于增强任务栏功能的用户交互。Your application should provide alternate ways of interacting with the user that are not dependent on the enhanced taskbar functionality. 下图显示了具有两个拇指按钮的任务栏预览，它们提供对播放和停止命令的访问。The following illustration shows a taskbar preview with two thumb buttons that provide access to the Play and Stop commands. ![任务栏项目信息示例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "任务栏项目信息示例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 任务栏拇指按钮Windows Taskbar Thumb Buttons ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在标记中创建。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 包含 对象的集合，这些对象提供对任务栏项中的播放和停止命令的访问。The contains a collection of objects that provide access to the Play and Stop commands from the taskbar item. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)]

summary.span: 在单击缩略图按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the thumbnail button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果处理 事件，事件处理程序将执行，而不是 绑定到缩略图按钮的任何。If you handle the event, the event handler executes instead of any that is bound to the thumbnail button.

summary.span: 获取或设置在单击此缩略图按钮时要调用的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 在单击此缩略图按钮时要调用的命令。

span.span: The command to invoke when this thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果处理 事件，事件处理程序将执行，而不是 绑定到缩略图按钮的任何。If you handle the event, the event handler executes instead of any that is bound to the thumbnail button. 在 XAML 中，此属性通常设置为一个现有命令库中的静态命令值，如或库中的一个 。In XAML, this property is often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as from the or library. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在标记中创建。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到 命令。The is bound to the command. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置要为缩略图按钮工具提示显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the thumbnail button tooltip.

value.span: 要为缩略图按钮工具提示显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the thumbnail button tooltip.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将图像添加到缩略图按钮，但在缩略图按钮上设置文本时不存在任何属性。You can add an image to a thumbnail button, but no property exists for setting text on the thumbnail button face. 但是，您可以将 属性设置为添加在鼠标指针移到缩略图按钮上时显示在工具提示中的说明性文本。However, you can set the property to add descriptive text that is displayed in a tooltip when the mouse pointer moves over the thumbnail button. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在标记中创建。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到 命令。The is bound to the command. 工具提示说明性文本将 **停止**。The tooltip descriptive text is **Stop**. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击缩略图按钮时任务栏缩略图是否关闭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the taskbar thumbnail closes when the thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 如果缩略图关闭，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the thumbnail closes; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当单击缩略图按钮时，任务栏缩略图仍然可见。By default, the taskbar thumbnail remains visible when a thumbnail button is clicked. 若要使缩略图在单击缩略图按钮时关闭，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To make the thumbnail close when a thumbnail button is clicked, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在标记中创建。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到 命令。The is bound to the command. 它配置为在单击按钮时关闭。It is configured to close when the button is clicked. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在缩略图按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the thumbnail button.

value.span: 在缩略图按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: The image that is displayed on the thumbnail button.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 在 "缩略图" 按钮上放置静态或动画。You can place a static or animated on the thumbnail button. 图像以适当大小呈现。The images are rendered at the appropriate size. 如果 表示，则 还使用适当的位深度。If the represents an , the appropriate bit depth is also used. 若要提供有关缩略图按钮的其他文本信息，请设置 属性。To provide additional textual information about the thumbnail button, set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在标记中创建。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到 命令。The is bound to the command. 按钮图像是在 XAML 中定义为静态资源的深灰色正方形。The button image is a dark gray square defined in XAML as a static resource. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在缩略图按钮周围是否突出显示边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a border and highlight is displayed around the thumbnail button.

value.span: 如果在缩略图按钮周围突出显示边框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a border and highlight is displayed around the thumbnail button; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，会在周围显示一个边框 ，当鼠标指针移到缩略图按钮上时，将显示一个突出显示。By default, a border appears around the , and a highlight is displayed when the mouse pointer is moved over the thumbnail button. 若要仅显示 不带边框和突出显示的，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To display only the without the border and highlight, set the property to `false`. 如果 为 `false` ，则在 单击缩略图按钮时仍将发生变化，以向用户提供视觉反馈。If is `false`, the still shifts when the thumbnail button is clicked to provide visual feedback to the user.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thumbnail button is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用缩略图按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the thumbnail button is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为时 `false` ，缩略图按钮不会响应 事件，并且 灰显。When the property is `false`, the thumbnail button does not respond to events and the is dimmed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以与缩略图按钮进行交互。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can interact with the thumbnail button.

value.span: 如果用户可以与缩略图按钮进行交互，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can interact with the thumbnail button; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为时 `false` ，缩略图按钮不会响应 事件。When the property is `false`, the thumbnail button does not respond to events. 但是，不 会灰显。However, the is not dimmed. 你可以使用不作为状态图标的交互式缩略图按钮。You can use a thumbnail button that is not interactive as a status icon. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则的设置 不起任何作用。If the property is `false`, the setting for does not have any effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定缩略图按钮的显示状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the display state of the thumbnail button.

value.span: 一个枚举值，该值指定缩略图按钮的显示状态。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the display state of the thumbnail button.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，缩略图按钮为 。By default, the thumbnail button is . [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 最多允许7个按钮的任务栏缩略图。allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 当 属性设置为时 ，缩略图按钮没有可见元素，但仍保留空间。When the property is set to , the thumbnail button has no visible elements, but space is still reserved for it. 当缩略图按钮为时 ，它没有任何可见的元素，并且不保留任何空白。When the thumbnail button is , it does not have any visible elements and no space is reserved for it. 在这种情况下，将显示集合中的其他缩略图按钮 。In this case, additional thumbnail buttons in the collection are displayed.
